name: AR-23 Liberator
description: The SEAF standard assault rifle, balancing power, fire rate, and weight for a reliable weapon against smaller targets.

name: AR-23P Liberator Penetrator
description: A modified Liberator fitted with a scope and firing armor-piercing rounds, to help users take down armored targets.

name: AR-23C Liberator Concussive

additional_traits.name: Staggering Rounds
additional_traits.description: Fires concussive rounds which do less damage but stagger enemies.

description: A modified Liberator firing concussive rounds which do less damage but stagger enemies.

name: AR-23A Liberator Carbine

additional_traits.name: Compact and Fast
additional_traits.description: Designed for increased viability in close quarters with a higher fire rate at the cost of higher spread.

description: A compact version of the Liberator designed for increased viability in close quarters. Has an increased fire rate at the cost of higher spread.

name: AR-61 Tenderizer

additional_traits.name: High-Caliber Stopping Power
additional_traits.description: A high-caliber assault rifle with a restrictive magazine size but more stopping power.

description: A high-caliber assault rifle with a restrictive magazine size but more stopping power.

name: BR-14 Adjudicator

additional_traits.name: Accurate and Powerful
additional_traits.description: Delivers righteous judgment to medium-sized enemies, though its restrictive magazine limits its effectiveness against large groups.

description: An accurate, armor-penetrating rifle, the BR-14 Adjudicator delivers righteous judgment to medium-sized enemies, though its restrictive magazine limits its effectiveness against large groups.

name: R-63 Diligence

additional_traits.name: High-Caliber Precision
additional_traits.description: Trades magazine capacity and rate of fire for powerful, accurate shots.

description: This high-caliber marksman rifle trades magazine capacity and rate of fire for powerful, accurate shots.

name: R-63CS Diligence Counter Sniper

additional_traits.name: Increased Damage
additional_traits.description: A modified Diligence rifle offering increased damage, but a reduced rate of fire. Fires a single bullet at a time.

description: A modified Diligence rifle offering increased damage, but a reduced rate of fire. Fires a single bullet at a time.

name: MP-98 Knight

additional_traits.name: Extremely High Fire Rate
additional_traits.description: A submachine gun with an extremely high rate of fire, which can be operated with one hand. Ideal for multitasking.

description: A submachine gun with an extremely high rate of fire, which can be operated with one hand. Ideal for multitasking.

name: SMG-37 Defender

additional_traits.name: High-Caliber
additional_traits.description: A high-caliber submachine gun which can be fired with one hand. Has a relatively low rate of fire.

description: A high-caliber submachine gun which can be fired with one hand. Has a relatively low rate of fire.

name: SMG-72 Pummeler

additional_traits.name: Concussive Rounds
additional_traits.description: Fires concussive rounds that stagger enemies. Slower rate of fire than other SMGs.

description: Fires concussive rounds that stagger enemies. Slower rate of fire than other SMGs.

name: SG-8 Punisher

additional_traits.name: Dual Magazine Pump-Action
additional_traits.description: A powerful dual magazine pump-action shotgun with limited armor penetration. Ideal for small and fast targets.

description: A powerful dual magazine pump-action shotgun, with limited armor penetration. Ideal for small and fast targets.

name: SG-8S Slugger

additional_traits.name: Heavy Slug Rounds
additional_traits.description: A modified Punisher shotgun firing heavy, high-damage slug rounds. Perfect for punching big holes in big targets.

description: A modified Punisher shotgun firing heavy, high-damage slug rounds. Perfect for punching big holes in big targets.

name: SG-451 Cookout

additional_traits.name: Incendiary Phosphorus Pellets
additional_traits.description: Fires a burst of incendiary phosphorus pellets, setting targets ablaze.

description: A pump shotgun that fires a burst of incendiary phosphorus pellets, setting targets ablaze.

name: SG-225 Breaker

additional_traits.name: Fully Automatic
additional_traits.description: A fully-automatic shotgun with a high rate of fire, excellent for controlling crowds. Requires frequent reloading.

description: A fully-automatic shotgun with a high rate of fire, excellent for controlling crowds. Requires frequent reloading.

name: SG-225SP Breaker Spray&Pray

additional_traits.name: Birdshot Rounds
additional_traits.description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing birdshot, small pellets which saturate an area to clear up smaller targets.

description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing birdshot, small pellets which saturate an area to clear up smaller targets.

name: SG-225IE Breaker Incendiary

additional_traits.name: Incendiary Projectiles
additional_traits.description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing incendiary projectiles. Generates heat during use, so limited to burst fire.

description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing incendiary projectiles. Generates heat during use, so limited to burst fire.

name: CB-9 Exploding Crossbow

additional_traits.name: Exploding Bolts
additional_traits.description: Fires powerful exploding bolts which do maximum damage upon direct impact. Gravity must be accounted for when aiming.

description: Fires powerful exploding bolts which do maximum damage upon direct impact. Gravity must be accounted for when aiming.

name: JAR-5 Dominator

additional_traits.name: Jet-Propelled Rounds
additional_traits.description: Firing jet-propelled rounds, the Dominator trades fire rate and magazine capacity for increased damage per projectile.

description: Firing jet-propelled rounds, the Dominator trades fire rate and magazine capacity for increased damage per projectile.

name: R-36 Eruptor

additional_traits.name: Jet-Assisted Shrapnel Shells
additional_traits.description: This bolt-action rifle fires jet-assisted shells that explode shrapnel in all directions upon impact. Not recommended for close-quarters use.

description: This bolt-action rifle fires jet-assisted shells that explode shrapnel in all directions upon impact. Not recommended for close-quarters use.

name: SG-8P Punisher Plasma
description: A modified Punisher shotgun firing exploding plasma rounds. Fire carefully - exploding plasma can injure squadmates.

name: ARC-12 Blitzer
description: This shotgun blasts a wide burst of high-voltage electricity that arcs between all units—enemy or otherwise—within range.

name: LAS-5 Scythe
description: A laser rifle firing a continuous beam. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

name: LAS-16 Sickle
description: A laser rifle, firing in short bursts. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

name: PLAS-1 Scorcher
description: A plasma rifle, firing a bolt of superheated gas which explodes on impact. Avoid standing in proximity to the blast.

name: FLAM-66 Torcher
description: A lightweight flamethrower. Shoots pressurized fuel through a dispersion nozzle into an open flame. Safe.
